newsitem.title: CHILE: Chile January consumer prices rise 0.5 percent.
newsitem.headline: Chile January consumer prices rise 0.5 percent.

text.p: Chilean consumer prices rose 0.5 percent in January from December, against a 0.3 percent increase in the same month last year, said the National Statistics Institute.
The January figures bring the increase in consumer prices over the last 12 months to 6.9 percent.
Prices which rose last month included food, up 0.6 percent; housing, up 0.6 percent; transport and telecommunications, up one percent; and the category "others," which increased 0.3 percent.
Clothing prices fell 1.9 percent last month.
